description:
In this course, you will learn how to start an eBay business and make it a full time job

My goal is to teach you everything there is to know about having a business on eBay from the very beginning to that dream 6 figure job everyone desires!

The course will feature an in depth look at how to:

  1. Open and eBay account/store
  2. Create a PayPal account to accept online payments
  3. How to get reliable wholesale accounts
  4. How to drop ship & carry no inventory
  5. How to source products & find the ones that sell

I will teach you the ins & outs of this business. I have been in this business for over 8 years and I will give you all of my knowledge in this course.
title: eBay - How To Drop Ship & Sell Physical Products
